item.title: Create Personal Blog
item.description: How to create a personal blog with hugo Open home page of Hugo : A blog generator by go language press ‘Quick start’ button to create! Step 1: Install Hugo brew install hugo Step 2: Create a New Site Create the directory to init your blog.If your want to build based github,you need call the directory name as ‘username.github.io’. hugo new site username.github.io Step 3: Add a Theme ‘cd’ into blog directory
